script.name: !ship.job.patrol
script.sourceplaintext:
set script command: COMMAND_PATROL
$targetSector = null if [OWNER] == Terran OR [OWNER] == ATF $targetSector = Terran end
$homesector = [THIS] -> get homesector if [DOCKEDAT] if [HOMEBASE] == [DOCKEDAT] $dummy = random value from 300000 to 6000000 - 1 $dummy = [THIS] -> wait idle rate minimum:$dummy ms [THIS] ->reset flight time else if [HOMEBASE] @ = wait randomly from 4500 to 5500 ms $destination = [HOMEBASE] gosub sub.MoveToObject $rand = random value from 300000 to 6000000 - 1 $sec = [THIS] -> wait idle rate minimum:$rand ms else if $homesector @ = wait randomly from 4500 to 5500 ms $destination = $homesector gosub sub.MoveToObject end end
$range = [THIS] -> get scanner range $returnhome = [FALSE] $refuel.runs = 0
while 1 @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms if is a new script version available START [THIS] -> delayed command COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS : arg1=null, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null return null end
* check the threat table $threat.id = [THIS] ->get closest threat id: type=[Threat.Aggressive], min severity=1, max range=1 skip if $threat.id $threat.id = [THIS] ->get closest threat id: type=[Threat.CallForHelp], min severity=2, max range=1 skip if $threat.id $threat.id = [THIS] ->get closest threat id: type=[Threat.Aggressive], min severity=2, max range=$s.range skip if $threat.id $threat.id = [THIS] ->get closest threat id: type=[Threat.CallForHelp], min severity=5, max range=$s.range skip if $threat.id $threat.id = [THIS] ->get closest threat id: type=[Threat.Illegal], min severity=1, max range=1
if $threat.id $destination = get threat sector: race=[TRUEOWNER] id=$threat.id if $destination -> exists $target = get threat object: race=[TRUEOWNER] id=$threat.id gosub sub.MoveToObject if $target -> exists if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $target @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object : the victim=$target follow in new sector=[FALSE] Only attack shields=[FALSE] end $pos = [THIS] -> get position as array @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.job.cmd.attackenemies : the range=$range refpos array x y z=$pos no idle, simply stand still=[FALSE] end end end
* send patrol ship to refuel (if refueling station can be found) if $refuel.runs > 30 @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.military.resupply : $refuel.runs = 0 else inc $refuel.runs = end
if $homesector == [SECTOR] if $trys > 1 $rand = random value from 0 to $trys - 1 else $rand = 0 end if not $rand $leader = [THIS] -> get job leader if $leader if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $leader $returnhome = [TRUE] end end else if $s.range AND ! $returnhome $homesector = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=$s.range, owner=[OWNER] if not $homesector if $targetSector $homesector = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=$s.range, owner=$targetSector else $homesector = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=$s.range, owner=null, security level=1 end end end end
if $homesector AND $homesector != [SECTOR] $sec = get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $homesector
if $sec $gate = get next gate on route from [SECTOR] to $homesector $ret = FLRET_TIMEOUT
while $ret == FLRET_TIMEOUT $pos = [THIS] -> get position as array @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.job.cmd.attackenemies : the range=$range refpos array x y z=$pos no idle, simply stand still=[FALSE] @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms if [THIS] -> is in active sector @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $gate with precision 15000 m : timeout=20000 ms else @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $gate with precision 15000 m : timeout=300000 ms end end
$pos = [THIS] -> get position as array @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.job.cmd.attackenemies : the range=$range refpos array x y z=$pos no idle, simply stand still=[FALSE] $destination = $sec gosub sub.MoveToObject end
else $pos = [THIS] -> get position as array @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.job.cmd.attackenemies : the range=$range refpos array x y z=$pos no idle, simply stand still=[FALSE]
if $returnhome $returnhome = [FALSE] $destination = $leader gosub sub.MoveToObject if [DOCKEDAT] $dummy = [THIS] -> wait idle rate minimum:30000 ms [THIS] ->reset flight time end else @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=120 wait while docked=[FALSE] end
end end return null
sub.MoveToObject: $dest.sector = null if is datatype[ $destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $dest.sector = $destination[3] else if $destination -> exists if $destination -> is of class Sector $dest.sector = $destination $destination = create new array, arguments=0, 0, 0, $dest.sector, null else $dest.sector = $destination -> get sector end end
if not $dest.sector -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=60 wait while docked=[FALSE] endsub end
if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $needed = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $dest.sector $energy = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $needed > $energy @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.resupply.self : Ware to Resupply=Energy Cells Quantity=200 Max Fly Range=5 end @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.jumptogate.nearest : targetpos=$destination should followers jump too=[TRUE] end if not $dest.sector == [SECTOR] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$destination end if not is datatype[ $destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY if $destination -> exists if not $destination -> is of class Sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$destination end end end
endsub return null

line.text: is a new script version available

comment.var: send patrol ship to refuel (if refueling station can be found)

line.text: get next sector on route from sector
get next gate on route from
needed jump drive energy for jump to sector

sval.val: send patrol ship to refuel (if refueling station can be found)
